sentence.Network_en: What I've tried very subtly to do is to reclaim language.
sentence.Network_cn: 我费尽心机在做的就是改造、拯救语言。

sentence.Network_en: We change subtly all the time.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们每时每刻都在发生细微的变化。

list.abs: imperative necessary a. 急切的；必要的imperceptibly subtly ad. 不可觉察地；极缓慢地imperceptibly unnoticeably a. 不可察觉的；极缓慢的.
imperative necessary a. 急切的；必要的imperceptibly subtly ad. 不可觉察地；极缓慢地imperceptibly unnoticeably a. 不可察觉的；极缓慢的.
Its silky petals and subtly sweet aroma make it a celebrity among blossoms ., 其如丝般的花瓣和巧妙的甜香味使它成为名人之间的花朵.
during the Depression , mass unemployment meant it was cutting edge designs so skirts remained reassuringly long and subtly feminine .经济大萧条时期，大规模的失业意味着缩短裙长的设计是不合时宜的，所以裙子理所当然地保持着长长的，女性化的风格。
Second , and more subtly , one can look at demography ., 第二 , 更加微妙的是 , 看看人口统计学方面.

entry.tran: 不易察觉的;不明显的;微妙的
entry.def: Something that is subtle is not immediately obvious or noticeable.

example.ex: ...the slow and subtle changes that take place in all living things...
example.tran: 发生在所有生物身上的缓慢而细微的变化

example.ex: Intolerance can take subtler forms too.
example.tran: 过敏反应也可能会表现得很不明显。

entry.def: A subtle person cleverly uses indirect methods to achieve something.

example.ex: I even began to exploit him in subtle ways...
example.tran: 我甚至开始巧妙地利用他。

example.ex: He is a subtle character, you know.

entry.def: Subtle smells, tastes, sounds, or colours are pleasantly complex and delicate.

sentences.sentence: "late nineteenth-century French opera at its most beautiful, subtly romantic with a twilight melancholy"

auth_sentence.content: Other pieces subtly adjust a small collage of elements.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other pieces subtly adjust a small collage of elements.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Other pieces subtly adjust a small collage of elements.

auth_sentence.content: Subtly, subtly, but they will reshape it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Subtly, subtly, but they will reshape it.

auth_sentence.content: Then, subtly, his feelings start to change.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then, subtly, his feelings start to change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then, subtly, his feelings start to change.

sentences.en: Their attitude to me altered subtly.
sentences.cn: 他们对我的态度已隐隐约约地有所改变。
